**FACTORY WARRANTY: 5YR/150 000KM**

Welcome to the world of the Renault KWID. 
The KWID’s design strategy symbolizes dynamic performance, robust strength and a taste for adventure. Its SUV-inspired stance offers a high driving position and greater visibility, making it ideal for zipping around in urban traffic or cruising down the open highway. Go ahead, make the most of every day. 

Contact us today. We deliver country wide, metallic color, licensing and Service & delivery fees are not included.
FREE INSURANCE FOR ONE YEAR.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. Balance of 5 year/200 000km  Warranty
Last Service - 23/08/2022 @58537KM Full Service History

The perfect fuel saver for a first time driver or student. Get 5.0l/100km with the Picantos 1.0litre engine. Loaded with all the extras you need for city driving this includes a crystal clear rear view camera, electric windows and mirrors, Apple CarPlay, Adnroid Auto, daytime running lights, multi-functioning steering wheel, rain sensing wipers and automatic headlights. This car is truly value for money. Rides on 15" Alloy Rims which really adds to the appeal of this beautifully maintained car. Do not miss the opportunity to test drive this amazing hot hatch!!

Trade ins welcome. Finance Available.
Certified Roadworthy Pre-owned.

attributes.description:
+ Optional 12 Month Warranty Available.

+ Vehicle is in a immaculate condition, come and view this vehicle.

+ We Deliver Nationwide, we are based just 40 min from Johannesburg.

+ Finance can be arranged.

+ Trade-Ins Welcome.

Why you must buy from Koos & Mike Used Cars:

1. Our Prices includes on the road cost.(CASH BUYS)

2. All our cars comes with a roadworthy certificate.

3. All cars will be delivered with a oil service before delivery.

4. Paperwork is our priority and not your responsibility.

5. Finance approvals is our goal.

6. You are our customer our advertisement and our reference for tomorrow.

7. The first 5 services on the car will be half price.

8. Warranty option available on all our cars (not included in selling price, can be taken out additionally)

9. We buy decent cars for cash.

10. All our cars have cartrack pre-installed. (Ts & Cs apply)

11. You get 1 free Valet for your vehicle before delivery

12. We offer an optional warranty package on all our vehicles with an R 7990 - R 19 000 installment

13. Ts & Cs APPLY

Please contact us for vehicle availability before you waste time and money on transport (our stock sells fast)
